definition: to insert/stick in/pierce/to take part in/to interfere/to interpose
value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

sentences.english: We obtain an upper bounded estimate for the convergence rate of the piecewise linear interpolation.
sentences.chinese: 给出了分段线性插值收敛速度的一种估计。

sentences.english: Get an interpolated normal at a given location.
sentences.chinese: 获取在给定位置的插值法线。

sentences.english: The error estimates for scattered data interpolants on spheres are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论球面上散布数据点插值的误差估计问题。
两个向量之间的线性插值。

sentences.english: At present, the traditional Neuton interpolation algorithm is used for zooming.
sentences.chinese: 目前，一般都采用传统牛顿插值算法来实现。

sentences.english: This lets you interpolate any of the vertex data along the 3 axes.
sentences.chinese: 这允许你沿着3个轴插值任何顶点数据。

sentences.english: It is compared with the segment linear interpolation method with regression.
sentences.chinese: 同时比较了分段线性插值加递归的信道估计方法。

sentences.english: Adopting geometric method, the rational function interpolation is constructed on polygonal element.
sentences.chinese: 采用几何的方法构造出多边形单元上的有理函数插值。

sentences.english: It is built on an algorithm that combines a polynomial transformation and triangulated irregular network (TIN) interpolation techniques.
sentences.chinese: 它融合了多项式校正和三角网插值技术。

sentences.english: Cubic splines interpolation was used to get smooth corneal surface.
sentences.chinese: 采用三次样条曲线插值角膜的内外表面。

sentences.english: Helical, parabolic, and cubic interpolations are usually executed in a stored program algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 螺旋线，抛物线，立方插值通常作为存储程序的算法。

sentences.english: Using linear interpolation, the system would normally return the following value.
sentences.chinese: 使用线性插值，系统通常返回以下值。

sentences.english: Established the landform model by distance power inverse ratio method and fractal interpolation algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 利用距离幂反比法加分形插值算法建立了地形模型。

sentences.english: The intermediate vertex positions are computed dynamically using interpolation schemes such as linear, Hermite curve, etc.
sentences.chinese: 中间的顶点位置使用插值方法动态计算决定。

sentences.english: It presents an improved edge-preserving interpolation algorithm based on solving PDE.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种改进的PDE边缘保持图像插值算法。

definition: to fit (data to a model)/a (close) fit
filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
